title: Music Toggle
body:
So how about we get a music player in the client of league for when we're just sitting around doing nothing?
Like you've made so many good songs that there's surely enough to justify doing this, alongside that I hardly get to hear a lot of the music that's not inside the game since I don't look for it. It's not somewhere in my face I have to go out and look for where it might be rather than just see " Oh music button, set up playlist through all of the songs by Riot... Done!" And then I can enjoy all the songs I like while chatting to friends, building rune pages, etc.

No one else though of this yet? If they have and Riot has acknowledged it then why haven't they?
